code_General.handlers.organizations¶

Generic Backend

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Handling of admin requests for organizations, api calls to auth0

Attributes¶

loggerError

Functions¶

addOrganizationTest(request)

For testing.

getOrganizationDetails(request)

Return details about organization.

updateDetailsOfOrganization(request)

Update details of organization of that user.

deleteOrganization(request)

Deletes an organization from the database and auth0.

organizationsGetInviteLink(request)

Ask Auth0 API to invite someone via e-mail and retrieve the link

organizationsAddUser(request)

Ask Auth0 API to invite someone via e-mail

organizationsFetchUsers(request)

Ask Auth0 API for all users of an organization

organizationsFetchInvitees(request)

Ask Auth0 API for all invited people of an organization

organizationsDeleteInvite(request, invitationID)

Ask Auth0 API to revoke an invitation

organizationsDeleteUser(request, userEMail)

Ask Auth0 API to delete someone from an organization via their mail address

organizationsCreateRole(request)

Ask Auth0 API to create a new role

organizationsAssignRole(request)

Assign a role to a person

organizationsRemoveRole(request)

Remove a role from a person

organizationsEditRole(request)

Ask Auth0 API to edit a role

organizationsGetRoles(request)

Fetch all roles for the organization

organizationsDeleteRole(request, roleID)

Delete role via ID

organizationsSetPermissionsForRole(request)

Add Permissions to role

organizationsGetPermissions(request)

Get all Permissions

organizationsGetPermissionsForRole(request, roleID)

Get Permissions of role

organizationsCreateNewOrganization(request)

Create a new organization, create an admin role, invite a person via email as admin.

class code_General.handlers.organizations.SReqBrandingColor(instance=None, data=empty, **kwargs)¶

Bases: rest_framework.serializers.Serializer

The BaseSerializer class provides a minimal class which may be used for writing custom serializer implementations.

Note that we strongly restrict the ordering of operations/properties that may be used on the serializer in order to enforce correct usage.

In particular, if a data= argument is passed then:

.is_valid() - Available. .initial_data - Available. .validated_data - Only available after calling is_valid() .errors - Only available after calling is_valid() .data - Only available after calling is_valid()

If a data= argument is not passed then:

.is_valid() - Not available. .initial_data - Not available. .validated_data - Not available. .errors - Not available. .data - Available.

code_General.handlers.organizations.organizationsCreateNewOrganization(request: rest_framework.request.Request)¶

Create a new organization, create an admin role, invite a person via email as admin. All via Auth0s API.

Parameters:

request (HTTP POST) – request with content as json

Returns:

Successfull or not

Return type:

HTTPResponse
